sentence: This committee oversees ESG issues that may impact the Company's business or operations, as well as the interests of shareholders and other stakeholders.
Intellectual property risk prevention We analyzed potential risks the Company may face in terms of intellectual property and proposed risk prevention measures.

Tech- nology risk Transitioning to a low-emission, high-efficiency economic system through technological improve - ments or innovations may lead to a gradual decline in production efficiency within the reporting pe - riod for enterprises.
Note Resources may be used in production, in storage, transportation, in buildings, electronic equipment, etc.
P80-P93 Aspect A4 Climate ChangeGeneral Disclosure Policies on identification and mitigation of significant climate- related issues which have impacted, and those which may impact, the issuer.
P80-P93 A4. 1 Description of the significant climate-related issues which have impacted, and those which may impact, the issuer, and the actions taken to manage them.
